To block your game in your firewall guy's:

Blocking any program from accessing the internet


In order to block the game from having access to the internet from Windows Firewall, follow these instructions (if you are running a Windows 7 OS) :

Control Panel > System and Security > Windows Firewall > Advanced Settings (on the left) > Outbound Rules (on the left) > New Rule (on the right)

-- Make sure Program is bubbled in
-- This program path: (guide it to the .exe directory)
-- Block the Connection
-- Domain, Private, and Public should be checked
-- Name it whatever you want (description is optional)


And you should be done!   Have fun! And please remember to SEED! Even "if" the game isn't good or not!
